Agency Preparation for Transitions Act of 2024
Agency Preparation for Transitions Act of 2024

A bill to amend the Presidential Transition Act of 1963 to require the timely appointment of agency transition officials, to ensure adequate performance and oversight of required transition-related preparation, to require new guidance for agencies and possible transition teams, and for other purposes.
